# PI certification reminder (copy/paste)

Subject: Action needed: certify your SciENcv biosketch + CPOS

Hi [PI Name],

Your SciENcv **NIH Biosketch** and **CPOS** drafts are ready.  
Please log into SciENcv and complete the **PI-only certification** step:

1) Open each document  
2) Click **Download PDF**  
3) Click **Certify**  
4) Send us the downloaded PDFs (or confirm we can download after certification)

Thanks!  
[Admin Name]
